conclusion: Analyze the paths of the liquid from points A, B, and C to determine which container it will flow into.
The liquid flows from A, which is positioned above the green baffle.
The green baffle directs the flow downward and to the right.
The liquid will flow into container E.
The liquid flows from B, which is positioned above the light blue baffle.
The light blue baffle directs the flow downward and to the left.
The liquid will flow into container D.
The liquid flows from C, which is positioned above the pink baffle.
The pink baffle directs the flow downward and to the right.
The liquid will flow into container F.
Liquid from A flows into container E.
Liquid from B flows into container D.
Liquid from C flows into container F.
